name: Markov Reads a Book 1998
description:
Thus Spake Zarathustra.
Visualisations of Markov Chain generated sentences trained on ebooks from Project Gutenberg.
The visualisations show how commonly the words appear within the corpus as well as compared to modern language, as well as length complexity. The larger the arc radius the longer the word, the more popular in the corpus the longer the arc, with the colour a comparison to modern popular usage.
